Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of Minister's denial of relief under s. 35(2) IRPA
Crimes.Governing_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (IRPA), s. 35(2)
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Motions for non-disclosure, appointment of special advocate
Evidence_Type: Positive recommendation from Ontario Regional War Crimes Unit
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Minister failed to consider all material evidence
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Selective reliance on evidence by the Minister
Crimes.Decision_Maker: Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to address material evidence favoring applicant
Crimes.Review_Outcome: Decision quashed and remitted for redetermination
Crimes.Evidence_Ignored: Ontario Regional War Crimes Unit's positive recommendation
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Compliance with natural justice and reasonableness
Crimes.Application_Factor: Applicant's role as former Rwandan diplomat
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Role in regimes accused of human rights violations
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Selective use of evidence, failure to consider exculpatory information
Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Violation due to incomplete consideration of evidence
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge based on procedural unfairness and incomplete record
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Issue estoppel, abuse of process, procedural fairness

Crimes.Crime_Name: Inadmissibility due to being a senior official in a government engaging in systematic or gross human rights violations
Crimes.Crime_Type: Human Rights Violations and Serious International Law Offenses
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Being a senior official in a regime accused of human rights abuses
Crimes.Evidence_Requirement: Evidence of role, influence, and complicity in abuses
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Unreasonable decision due to selective evidence use
Crimes.Government_Body_or_Authority: Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship
Crimes.Exemptions_or_Defenses_Cited: Limited influence, lack of direct involvement
Crimes.Nature_of_Participation: Alleged high-level association with abusive regimes
Crimes.Temporal_Context: Periods of human rights violations in Rwanda
Crimes.Personal_Data_Implicated: Diplomatic status, alleged conduct during regime
Crimes.Assessment_Standard: Whether presence would be detrimental to national interest
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Reasonableness and compliance with natural justice
Crimes.Protection_Claim: Request for exceptional relief from inadmissibility
Crimes.State_Protection_Assessment: Not applicable – claimant was part of state apparatus
Crimes.Risk_Factor: Association with regimes committing gross human rights violations
Crimes.Targeted_Group: Victims of human rights violations in Rwanda
Crimes.Enforcement_Action: Inadmissibility finding and denial of relief
Crimes.Perpetrator_Entity: Rwandan government during periods of abuse
Crimes.Victim_Basis: Systematic or gross human rights violations
